I H8 Crim Law. HOWEVER he is a fabulous teacher. Wrote his own books, awesome author. HE LOVES teaching, and he musta done it 4 a while. SERIOUSLY DONT GO TO LANGARA GO TO SFU 4 THIS GUY. (took both)

took by distance ed - awesome topics, papers, feeback. Readings very helpful. Learned a lot in this class, more than I can say for a lot of the others I took.
